data.title: Manuel Peralta, MD
data.meta_description: Central Virginia Family Physicians (CVFP) Medical Group is a regional primary care provider offering quality healthcare services to patients in Central Va.
data.text:
Physician

Dr. Peralta is passionate about Family Medicine and working closely with his patients across the Lynchburg-area to help them achieve their optimal health. He went to the University of the East College of Medicine in Quezon City, Philippines, and completed his post-doctoral residency training at the Carilion Medical Center in Roanoke, VA. Dr. Peralta has been married for 17 years now, blessed with 4 sons, 14, 10, 7, and 4.
